channel.title: [508] Character Selection
channel.description:
FOR [508] INTERESTS ONLY!!
IN MY PREVIOUS POST I DONE JUST PICTURES!!
picture1::
[IMG]http://i725.photobucket.com/albums/ww255/dcrew09/rsloginstyled1.png[/img]
picture2::
[IMG]http://i725.photobucket.com/albums/ww255/dcrew09/rsloginstyled2.png[/img]
things used to make:: Adobe photoshop CS4
Credits: 100% Me
NOW IN MY PRIVATE SERVER I HAVE
(SHALL RELEASE SOON)
PICTURE::
[IMG]http://i725.photobucket.com/albums/ww255/dcrew09/rsloginstyled3.png[/img]
SOON I WILL POST A TOPIC ON MY RELEASE
(SERVER NAME: LYNXSCAPE) (VERSION WITH THIS INTERFACE: 4.0)
NOW ADDED CHARACTER INTERFACE SCREEN - 100% ADDING CREATABLE CHARACTERS (MAX 3) - 30%
GET YOUR HOPES UP AND AWAIT WITH YOUR PATIENCE
IF YOU EVER WANT ME TWO RELEASE DONT FLAME, GIVE ME PRAISE!
